at.jku.apidesign.orfapi

Class OrfNewsApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.jku.apidesign.orfapi.OrfNewsApi

  • public final class OrfNewsApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Extracts News-Article from http://news.orf.at and puts them into Java-Objects.
    Author:
    dpril
